name: market for venting of nitrogen, liquid | venting of nitrogen, liquid | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8469/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'venting of nitrogen, liquid', in the Global geography.;No transport required.;venting of nitrogen, liquid'  describes venting of gaseous nitrogen (CAS 007727-37-9) into the atmosphere as an emission to air. Nitrogen is produced mainly as a by-product in air separation, cryogenic activity, where oxygen, liquid is produced as a reference product.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'venting of nitrogen, liquid',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  venting of nitrogen, liquid', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
